name: BBBC Download
title: BBBC Download
description: Downloads the datasets on the Broad Bioimage Benchmark Collection website
author: Saket Prem(saket.prem@axleinfo.com), Matthew McIntyre(Matthew.McIntyre@axleinfo.com)
institution: National Center for Advancing Translational Sciences, National Institutes of Health

inputs.name: name
inputs.description: The name of the datasets to be downloaded(spereate the datasets with a comma. eg: BBBC001,BBBC002,BBBC003 )

ui.title: Input name of datasets as string
ui.description: Input the name of the datasets to be downloaded as a string
